item.title: Analysis of Skylanders Giants PC game
item.description: When I was a kid, I played Skylanders: Giants, it was probably my favourite game growing up. It was released for the following platforms: Nintendo 3DS PlayStation 3 Wii Wii U Xbox 360 As much as I’d like to believe that the game was ported to PC, it’s way more likely that this is malware, especially given how SEO-optimized it is and the list in the blog archive.
